---
title: Cancel a Standing Order
---

# Cancel a Standing Order

Cancel a Standing Order with the API.

:::caution
Canceling a Standing Order doesn't cancel transfers that have already been executed.
:::

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `cancelStandingOrder` mutation.
1. Add the ID for your standing order.
1. Add all the information you'd like to review in the payload.
1. Add rejections (not shown).

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {3,10} showLineNumbers
mutation CancelOrder {
  cancelStandingOrder(input: { standingOrderId: "$YOUR_STANDING_ORDER_ID" }) {
    ... on CancelStandingOrderSuccessPayload {
      __typename
      standingOrder {
        statusInfo {
          status
          ... on StandingOrderCanceledStatusInfo {
            __typename
            canceledAt
            status
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload shows the status of this Standing Order is now `Canceled` (line 7).

```json {7} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "cancelStandingOrder": {
      "__typename": "CancelStandingOrderSuccessPayload",
      "standingOrder": {
        "statusInfo": {
          "status": "Canceled",
          "__typename": "StandingOrderCanceledStatusInfo",
          "canceledAt": "2024-01-24T20:27:07.803Z"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
